member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType
member.summary: Specifies the shape types used in the image editor.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Path
member.summary: Represents the path as shape type.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Rectangle
member.summary: Represents the rectangle. The shape two sides are paralled.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Circle
member.summary: Represents the rounded shape, which is defined in a two-dimensional curved shape without corner/edges.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Text
member.summary: Represents th text as shape type.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Arrow
member.summary: Represents the arrow connected with line. The shape as arrow at line end.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Line
member.summary: Represents the line, which is defined in a two-dimensional plane by two points.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.Dotted
member.summary: Represents the dotted line of shape, in a two-dimensional plane, it is defined line of dots by two points.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.DoubleArrow
member.summary: Represents the double arrow as shape type.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.DottedArrow
member.summary: Represents the dotted arrow shape. It is specified line of dots and having arrow at line end.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.DottedDoubleArrow
member.summary: Represents the dots with double arrow shape. It is specified line of dots and having arrow at both line end.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.Enums.ShapeType.None
member.summary: Represents the none as shape type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.SfImageEditor
member.summary: Represents a control that helps in editing the image.
member.remarks: The SfImageEditor control is a very handy tool to edit an image by annotating with text and built-in shapes. It allows you to crop, rotate, and flip an image and has an in built toolbar to perform these operations.
